Recognition Code This is simply your email address. Secret Spell Forgot your spell? Login or continue using Don't have a profile? Create your profile Incorrect recognition code! Incorrect or too short spell! Entry process failed! // REGISTER SCREEN Create a profile Repeat spell Incorrect or too short spell repetition! Spell and its repetition are not the same! Profile creation process failed! By creating a Profile, you agree to the [Privacy Policy](https://krwiodawca.cwiklin.ski/privacy_policy/) and [Regulations](https://krwiodawca.cwiklin.ski/terms_conditions/). Create a Profile Do you already have a Profile? Enter or create a Profile using // RESET Reset Spell Enter the Recognition Code you provided when creating your Profile. We will send a message to it with a magic link to reset the spell. Send message with link An error occurred while sending data The message is on its way! Check your mailbox, and click the magic link to change the spell. // SETUP Hello, Traveler You are about to embark on a magical journey, so we need some information about **You**. They will allow you to neatly count magic drops, and serve up neat data about **Your** adventures. Save information // HOME Hello, %s! Hero Heroine Your blood has magical power Keep it up, %s! Get started, %s! Next Donation Information about the next possible drip date will appear here. Drip History Droplets donated by you will appear here. Add a portion of Droplets. Droplet History %d donations Droplets Droplets You earned Bronze\nOrder You earned Silver\nOrder You earned Gold\nOrder You earned Platinum\nOrder This is Magic! Full Drop Collection is now POSSIBLE Next possible Full Drops Collection (%s) // NOTIFICATIONS News! News! Fresh Old Mark as Old Mark All as Old Normal Importance High Importance News Place No Fresh News No Old News Mark All as old To mark All News as old, click the magic button **Mark** Mark All News has been marked as old! // PROFILES Your profile the untamed phoenix the determined pegasus hardworking fairy empathetic nymph invincible ruler powerful mage Data %s Magic name Error changing name Magic address Error changing address Secret spell New spell Repeat arcane spell Current spell too short or invalid! Invalid spell format (at least 5 characters) Spell repeat is not the same as new! There was an error updating your magic data. There was an error updating spells. An error occurred while updating the magic address. Profile data has been enchanted! New spell has been set. Edit Data Select Character Change the Spell Oops - some error while updating profile Account deletion You are starting the account deletion process.\n\nAll your profile data, all information about Kropelki, will be **permanently deleted**!!! \n\n\n\nTo continue the account deletion process, press the *%s* button. Permanently Delete Account Deleting Magic Drops... Deleting Profile ... // NEW DONATION New Droplets Add Droplets Droplet Type No Droplet Type Droplets in ml Incorrect Droplet Amount Droplet Date Select Date Date cannot be a future date An error occurred while saving Droplets Drip Location Drip Location not selected! Not enough power to Drip 😔 Magic! New Droplets saved! // EDIT DONATION Droplet Edit Invalid Droplet Tag Save changes Droplets data has been saved! // DONATIONS Your Magic Droplets Delete Edit Delete saved Droplets Saved Droplets will be permanently deleted!\nDo you want to continue? An error occurred while deleting Droplets. More Magic Droplets have flown! %p has collected whole %s of Droplets!\n\n%l Magic Droplets are gone... That's a sign you need to get new ones! // CENTERS Drip locations Select drip locations to view their aspects %s properties Drip address Contacts Useful aspects Select places... // SETTINGS Schemes Default Drip Location Starting value for sum of all Drips (ml) Gender Drip Notifications Save Schemes Schemes saved. Disappear Disappearing Sad to disappear - don't worry, **your Drops are saved**, but to use them you'll have to reappear! // INFO Application Information Team Libraries

##### Graphic Design **Agata Wolna** [(wolnaagata95@gmail.com)](mailto:wolnaagata95@gmail.com)

---

##### Development **Michał Ćwikliński** (mobiGEEK)

---

The application was written in *Kotlin*, using the *Compose MultiPlatform* framework, and is delivered on three platforms: - Android [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mobi.cwiklinski.bloodline) - iOS [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/blood-donor-diary/id1563904745?platform=iphone) - MacOS [Mac App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/blood-donor-diary/id1563904745?platform=mac) https://bloodmagic.cwiklinski.mobi/android https://bloodmagic.cwiklinski.mobi/ios
